name: Resistance
effect: :instant: Play this card immediately after the enemy casts a [spell](../spells/index.md). If the spell was cast with 1 :empower: or less, ignore the [Spell](../spells/index.md) card's effect.
expert_effect: :instant: Play this card immediately after the enemy casts a [spell](../spells/index.md). Ignore the [Spell](../spells/index.md) card's effect.
